Reset Password Notification: Notification de réinitialisation du mot de passe
This password reset link will expire in: Ce lien de réinitialisation de mot de passe expirera dans :count minutes.
You are receiving this email because we: Vous recevez cet e-mail car nous avons reçu une demande de réinitialisation du mot de passe pour votre compte.
The :attribute must contain at least one: The :attribute must contain at least one letter.
The :attribute must contain at least one number.
The :attribute must contain at least one symbol.
The :attribute must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
The given :attribute has appeared in a d: The given :attribute has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different :attribute.
